author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
Fixes crash in RelVal 135.9 found out to be due to a BXVector being configured with bxLast < bxFirst.  In addition to fixing calling code, at protection to BXVector.  

Also fixed potential problem with L1TGlobalUtils, discovered during bug hunt, which wasn't checking that size of bx=0 was nonzero before using content of begin(0).

Some assert statements are left in place to alert me if I am wrong, but the protections added should insure that these assertions do not fail.
title: Fix IB crashes due to BX range set improperly
